name: big-pearl
short_effect: Sell for 3750 Pokédollars, or to Ore Collector for 7500 Pokédollars.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A rather large pearl that has a very nice silvery sheen. It can be sold to shops for a high price.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A rather large pearl that has a very nice silvery sheen. It can be sold to shops for a high price.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A rather large pearl that has a very nice silvery sheen. It can be sold at a high price to shops.
